Text:
exmnova, i have been dowloading your torrents for a long time and love them, but are all your HD porns going to be 1080p now? If so, I won't be able to download from you anymore; my machine can't handle it and it's too much bandwidth anyway :(
In my opinion, 720p is good enough!
Thanks anyhow, cheers
Sanyi, that's what the non-HD pron category is for.  KEEP THE 1080p coming xoxoxoxo.
Well considering 720p is HD I think his question and request for 720p is quite acceptable... it's not like he's asking for sub-HD quality here.
